subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Nets missed an opportunity for a confidence-boosting road victory, while the Cavaliers survived a late Nets surge, even though LeBron James was held to a relatively quiet 19 points.
snippet: The Nets missed an opportunity for a confidence-boosting road victory, while the Cavaliers survived a late Nets surge, even though LeBron James was held to a relatively quiet 19 points.
